## panes

<dfn>RStudio is arranged with four window "panes".</dfn> By default, the upper left pane is the **source pane**, where you view and edit source code from files. The bottom left pane is usually the **console pane**, where you can type in commands and view output messages You can change the location of panes and what tabs are shown under **`Preferences > Pane Layout`**.
